cons: It should be avoided during pregnancy and breastfeeding time.
Allspice may cause serious allergic reactions in hypersensitive individuals.
description: Allspice relieves pain caused by a number conditions like muscle aches, joint pains, sprains, gout, arthritis, and hemorrhoids.
Allspice helps boost immunity with the help of its antibacterial activity that is pretty effective against a number of stomach bacteria like E.
Allspice contains a range of components like vitamin A, vitamin C, eugenol, quercetin, and tannins that make it a powerful antioxidant.
Allspice has been traditionally used in dental procedures as it contains eugenol that works as a great local anesthetic.
The potassium found in allspice also acts as a vasodilator and increases blood flow throughout the body.
